text: Solange Sicard (Isabelle Sicard Solange 5 January 1902 Paris - 7 September 1969 Clichy-la-Garenne) was a French actress. == Career == She began in 1921 at the Comédie-Française , where she played around fifteen roles in three years. In 1921, she appeared in Horecka, by Louise Delluc. in 1936, in Les petites alliegies, and in 1954 in La cage aux souris, In 1944, she acted in Le Soulier de satin She taught acting at the Cours Pathe. == References == Category:1902 births Category:1969 deaths Category:French actors
title: Solange Sicard
